ConfigurationOption.Value: select dl.document, di.description, di.doctype, di.urltype, di.urlname, di.show, dl.createby, dl.createdate, dl.changeby, dl.changedate, dl.ownertable, dl.ownerid, dl.doclinksid, dl.docinfoid from doclinks dl left join docinfo di on dl.docinfoid = di.docinfoid

Struct._value: := test( nvl( ${MX_ENABLE_ATTACHMENTS} ), query( "Document Files", ${1}, " 'File Name' = ${File Name} and 'Storage Key' = 'Maximo Doclinks' " ), null)

EventAction.Condition: ${Owner Table} is null or ${ownerid} is null

ConfigurationOption.Value: Cannot create attachments for new records without offline ID role

Struct._value: := "photo-" || decode( ${Owner Table}, 'ASSET', "Asset-" || query( "Assets", "Asset", "assetuid = ${ownerid}" ), 'ITEM', "Item-" || query( "Inventory", "Item", "itemid = ${ownerid}" ), 'WORKORDER', "WO-" || query( "Work Orders", "Work Order", "workorderid = ${ownerid}" ), ${ownerid} ) || "-" || format( now(), "yyyyMMddHHmm" ) || ".jpg"

EventAction.Condition: ${docinfoid} is null and ${URL Type} == 'FILE' and substring( ${URL}, 0, length( ${ROOT_PATH} ) ) != ${ROOT_PATH}
IsInsert() and ${URL Type} == 'FILE' and ${File Data} is null

ConfigurationOption.Value: File Data has not been specified.

Struct._value: := "photo-" || decode( ${Owner Table}, 'ASSET', "Asset-" || query( "Assets", "Asset", "assetuid = ${ownerid}" ), 'ITEM', "Item-" || query( "Inventory", "Item", "itemid = ${ownerid}" ), 'WORKORDER', "WO-" || query( "Work Orders", "Work Order", "workorderid = ${ownerid}" ), ${ownerid} ) || "-" || format( now(), "yyyyMMddHHmm" ) || ".jpg"

OfflineQuery.Name: Offline By Assigned Work Order
OfflineQuery.Condition: nvl( ${MX_ENABLE_ATTACHMENTS} ) and nvl( ${MX_ASSIGNED_WORKORDERIDS} ) is not null
